TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MASAuthenticationStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: MASAuthenticationStatus states the authentication status of the application.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASAuthenticationStatus LoginAnonymously = int32(1)

Docs.summary: MASAuthenticationStatusLoginAnonymously represents that the app has been authenticated with client credentials.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASAuthenticationStatus LoginWithUser = int32(0)

Docs.summary: MASAuthenticationStatusLoginWithUser represents that the app has been authenticated with user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MASFoundation.MASAuthenticationStatus NotLoggedIn = int32(-1)

Docs.summary: MASAuthenticationStatusNotLoggedIn represents that the app has not been authenticated.
